NK081(zhu)012:2: dag pa gnyis ldan chos sku kun tu bzang //
NK081(zhu)012:3: lhun grub nges pa lnga rdzogs longs sku'i sprin //
NK081(zhu)012:4: gang 'dul der snang ma 'gags sprul pa'i sku //
NK081(zhu)012:5: sku gsum dbyer med bla med mchog gis skyongs //
NK081(zhu)012:6: gzhi rgyud dbang bzhis smin pa'i byang chub sems //
NK081(zhu)012:7: lam rgyud bskyed rdzogs zab mo'i rnal 'byor gyis //
NK081(zhu)012:8: 'bras rgyud sku bzhi'i go sar sbyor byed pa'i //
NK081(zhu)012:9: rgyud sde bye ba'i yang bcud 'di kho na //
NK081(zhu)012:10: snang srid ye sangs rgyas pa lta bu'i lung //
NK081(zhu)012:11: dag mnyam bden pa dbyer med grub pa'i mtha' //dbang rnon rig 'dzin rnam bzhi'i rgyal thabs la //
NK081(zhu)012:12: mig 'phrul bzhin du bgrod byed 'di min su //
NK081(zhu)012:13: tan+t+ra'i zab gnad rig 'dzin rgyal po yi //
NK081(zhu)012:14: lung du bsdus pa'i man ngag yid bzhin dbang //
NK081(zhu)012:15: grub mchog yongs kyi gshegs shul zla med phul //
NK081(zhu)012:16: snga 'gyur brgyud pa'i khyad nor mtshungs bral yin //
NK081(zhu)012:17: gzhan zer brag ca'i lad mo mi mdzad par //
NK081(zhu)012:18: rang lugs 'khrul pa kun bral ma ni ka /bshad sgrub rgyal mtshan rtse mor mchod mdzes zhes //
NK081(zhu)012:19: gus ldan thal mo sbyor dang chab cig par //
NK081(zhu)012:20: man ngag rnam par bkod pa'i gzhung bzang che //
NK081(zhu)012:21: gcig las du mar 'char ba'i spar gyi 'phrul //
NK081(zhu)012:22: bstan gnyis dar rgyas gling gi chos grwar spel //
NK081(zhu)012:23: dge bas 'gro kun gdod gzhir ngal 'tsho shog /mkha' la rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i sprin chen 'khrigs //
NK081(zhu)012:24: sa la dam ldan slob ma'i 'du tshogs rgyas //
NK081(zhu)012:25: bar la smin grol bdud rtsi'i char rgyun 'jo //
NK081(zhu)012:26: nges gsang bstan pa dar smin bkra shis shog //
NK081(zhu)012:27: ces pa'ang rnam dkar 'du byed pa po gzhan phan
NK081(zhu)012:28: chos kyi blo gros rang nyid kyis bris pa dza
